unnormalised: **Automotive: Traffic Woes Get a Regulation Refresh!**
normalised: **Automotive: Traffic Woes Get a Regulation Refresh!**

unnormalised: Hey Bangalore drivers, listen up! The traffic police are shaking things up with a fresh batch of regulations aimed at easing our daily commute nightmare. Dr. Patil, the traffic commissioner, announced yesterday a crackdown on unauthorized parking, especially near busy junctions like MG Road and Brigade Road.
normalised: Hey Bangalore drivers, listen up! The traffic police are shaking things up with a fresh batch of regulations aimed at easing our daily commute nightmare. Doctor Patil, the traffic commissioner, announced yesterday a crackdown on unauthorized parking, especially near busy junctions like M G Road and Brigade Road.

unnormalised: Expect hefty fines, possibly up to Rs. 5000, for repeat offenders. Also, lane discipline is getting a major push. No more weaving like you're driving a rickshaw through Chandni Chowk! They're implementing AI-powered cameras to monitor traffic flow and catch offenders red-handed.
normalised: Expect hefty fines, possibly up to rupee five thousand, for repeat offenders. Also, lane discipline is getting a major push. No more weaving like you're driving a rickshaw through Chandni Chowk! They're implementing A I-powered cameras to monitor traffic flow and catch offenders red-handed.

unnormalised: The new rules also address the growing issue of modified vehicles. Expect checks, especially on those noisy exhausts that wake up the entire neighbourhood.
normalised: The new rules also address the growing issue of modified vehicles. Expect checks, especially on those noisy exhausts that wake up the entire neighbourhood.

unnormalised: They are also creating special parking zones for two-wheelers around Metro stations like Indiranagar and Jayanagar - about 5000 sq ft. in total.
normalised: They are also creating special parking zones for two-wheelers around Metro stations like Indiranagar and Jayanagar - about five thousand square feet in total.

unnormalised: "We hope these measures will bring some much-needed order to our roads," Dr. Patil said. "It's about time we drive responsibly, yaars!"
normalised: "We hope these measures will bring some much-needed order to our roads," Doctor Patil said. "It's about time we drive responsibly, yaars!"

unnormalised: Here's hoping it makes a difference and doesn't just add to the chai stall gossip.
normalised: Here's hoping it makes a difference and doesn't just add to the chai stall gossip.
